margin--x-none.title: No horizontal margin
margin--x-none.description: Removes all margin from the left and right.

margin--x-xs.title: Tiny horizontal margin
margin--x-xs.description: Adds a tiny amount of margin to the left and right.

margin--x-sm.title: Small horizontal margin
margin--x-sm.description: Adds a small amount of margin to the left and right.

margin--x-md.title: Medium horizontal margin
margin--x-md.description: Adds a medium amount of margin to the left and right.

margin--x-lg.title: Large horizontal margin
margin--x-lg.description: Adds a large amount of margin to the left and right.

margin--x-xl.title: Extra-large horizontal margin
margin--x-xl.description: Adds an extra-large amount of margin to the left and right.

margin--x-xxl.title: Double-extra-large horizontal margin
margin--x-xxl.description: Adds a double-extra-large amount of margin to the left and right.
